trans-unit.source: The type of objects to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較之物件的類型。

trans-unit.source: Defines a method that a type implements to compare two objects.
trans-unit.target: 定義類型會實作以比較兩個物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: This interface is used with the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.BinarySearch%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面會搭配<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.BinarySearch%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: It provides a way to customize the sort order of a collection.
trans-unit.target: 它提供一個方法來自訂集合的排序次序。

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement this interface include the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SortedDictionary%602> and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SortedList%602> generic classes.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個介面的類別包括<xref:System.Collections.Generic.SortedDictionary%602>和<xref:System.Collections.Generic.SortedList%602>泛型類別。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this interface is the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Comparer%601> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面的預設實作是<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Comparer%601>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.StringComparer> class implements this interface for type <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.StringComparer>類別會實作這個介面的型別<xref:System.String>。

trans-unit.source: This interface supports ordering comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 此介面支援排序比較。

trans-unit.source: That is, when the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Comparer%601.Compare%2A> method returns 0, it means that two objects sort the same.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，當<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Comparer%601.Compare%2A>方法會傳回 0，這表示兩個物件排序相同。

trans-unit.source: Implementation of exact equality comparisons is provided by the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601> generic interface.
trans-unit.target: 所提供的完全相等比較實作<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601>泛型介面。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you derive from the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Comparer%601> class instead of implementing the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer%601> interface, because the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Comparer%601> class provides an explicit interface implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Comparer%601.System%23Collections%23IComparer%23Compare%2A> method and the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Comparer%601.Default%2A> property that gets the default comparer for the object.
trans-unit.target: 我們建議您從衍生<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Comparer%601>類別而不是實作<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer%601>介面，因為<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Comparer%601>類別提供的明確介面實作<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Comparer%601.System%23Collections%23IComparer%23Compare%2A>方法和<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Comparer%601.Default%2A>屬性，取得物件的預設比較子。

trans-unit.source: The following example implements the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer%601> interface to compare objects of type `Box` according to their dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會實作<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer%601>要比較的類型物件的介面`Box`根據他們的維度。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Comparer%601> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Comparer%601>類別。

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個物件。

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個物件。

trans-unit.source: Compares two objects and returns a value indicating whether one is less than, equal to, or greater than the other.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個物件並傳回值，指出其中一個物件為小於、等於或大於另一個物件。

trans-unit.source: A signed integer that indicates the relative values of <paramref name="x" /> and <paramref name="y" />, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 帶正負號的整數，表示 <paramref name="x" /> 和 <paramref name="y" /> 的相對值，如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 值

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Meaning
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 意義

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> Less than zero
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term>小於零

trans-unit.source: </term><description><paramref name="x" /> is less than <paramref name="y" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description><paramref name="x" /> 小於 <paramref name="y" />。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> Zero
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 零

trans-unit.source: </term><description><paramref name="x" /> equals <paramref name="y" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description><paramref name="x" /> 等於 <paramref name="y" />。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> Greater than zero
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 大於零

trans-unit.source: </term><description><paramref name="x" /> is greater than <paramref name="y" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description><paramref name="x" /> 大於 <paramref name="y" />。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to provide a customized sort order comparison for type `T`.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法以提供自訂排序次序比較類型`T`。

trans-unit.source: Comparing `null` with any reference type is allowed and does not generate an exception.
trans-unit.target: 比較`null`具有任何參考類型允許和不會產生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: A null reference is considered to be less than any reference that is not null.
trans-unit.target: Null 參考，會被視為小於任何不是 null 的參考。

trans-unit.source: The following example implements the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer%601> interface to compare objects of type `Box` according to their dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會實作<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer%601>要比較的類型物件的介面`Box`根據他們的維度。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Comparer%601> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Comparer%601>類別。
